name: Attack on Titan: Wings of Freedom
name_original: Attack on Titan: Wings of Freedom
description:
You are Mikasa Ackerman, titan-killer extraordinaire. Slay every titan while racing through levels to achieve the best time possible. Or focus on saving civilians and avoiding obstacles — the choice is yours. Will you achieve the fastest time of all?

Controls:

  • Move: A / D
  • Jump: W or Space
  • Grapple: Left Mouse Button
  • Attack: S or Z
  • Heal: Shift
  • Interact: E or Enter

Developer's ATK (All Titans Killed) Best Times:

  • Tutorial: 00:40:02
  • Trost: 03:21:06
  • Forest of Giant Trees: 03:23:51
  • Castle Utgard: 01:52:78
  • Shiganshina: 04:00:65

Changelog

1.01 :

  • changed a typo in the tutorial controls UI
  • changed some dialogue for clarity on how to complete the levels
  • added additional buttons for certain inputs
  • upped the background contrast in the forest level so it's clearer which trees are grappleable
  • made it so that abnormal titans in the forest level do not punch regular titans when they stay in their collider
  • adjusted the volume on some SFX
  • adjusted the invisible walls' positions in the castle level to make it more clear how the level is intended to be played
  • added particle effects to falling rocks in the final level
